projects.name: Sales Agent
projects.description: Enterprise AI sales automation with 6 specialized agents. Processes leads in ~12 seconds vs. 2-4 hours manually.
projects.whatILearned: LangGraph orchestration, FastAPI production patterns, Close CRM integration, multi-agent coordination, ultra-low latency AI ($0.000006/lead)

projects.name: Dealer Scraper MVP
projects.description: When I was selling solar, I needed this tool. So I built it.

projects.name: Swaggy Stacks
projects.description: Institutional-grade algorithmic trading platform. Paper trading with 11 options strategies + full observability.

projects.name: AI Cost Optimizer
projects.description: Intelligent LLM routing saves 40-70% on AI costs. Routes across 40+ models from 8 providers.
projects.whatILearned: Model Context Protocol (MCP), cost optimization algorithms, complexity scoring, multi-provider routing, Claude Desktop integration

projects.name: ThetaRoom

projects.whatILearned: FlashAttention-3, GraphRAG multi-hop reasoning, Next.js 15, Neon TimescaleDB, autonomous trading systems, <$250/month GPU deployment
